thread.title: BRIEF-Novanta Q4 Adjusted Earnings Per Share $0.44

title: BRIEF-Novanta Q4 Adjusted Earnings Per Share $0.44
text: February 28, 2018 / 2:25 PM / Updated 5 minutes ago BRIEF-Novanta Q4 Adjusted Earnings Per Share $0.44 Reuters Staff Feb 28 (Reuters) - Novanta Inc: * NOVANTA ANNOUNCES FINANCIAL RESULTS FOR THE FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR 2017 * Q4 ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.44 * Q4 GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.00 FROM CONTINUING OPERATIONS * SEES FY 2018 REVENUE ABOUT $585 MILLION TO $600 MILLION * SEES Q1 2018 REVENUE ABOUT $138 MILLION TO $142 MILLION * Q4 REVENUE ROSE 49 PERCENT TO $146.9 MILLION * SEES FY 2018 ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.85 TO $1.96 * SEES Q1 2018 ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.40 TO $0.43 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
